description: Three 1-hour online quizzes covering Topic 1 (Systems and Energy), Topic 2 (Energy balances), and Topic 3 (Properties of pure substances). Includes multiple choice/answer and numerical questions. Each quiz worth 10%.

2-hour thermodynamic processes experiment (Thermoboard) with 10-page report. Involves pre-lab preparation, data recording during lab sessions, and analysis linking experimental results to theoretical principles.
2-hour compressor performance experiment with 10-page report. Requires pre-lab work, data collection during lab sessions (weeks 8-9), and analysis of thermodynamic principles in machinery operation.
2-hour exam assessing entire course content. Focuses on solving closed/open system problems and analyzing air-standard cycles, vapor cycles, and refrigeration cycles using thermodynamic laws.
